{"id":1454811848,"question_id":3616,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 weeks, 4 days","timestamp":1731811110,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1454811848/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Make Array Elements Equal to Zero","memory":"21.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int countValidSelections(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int N = (int)nums.size();\n\n        int ans = 0;\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n            int l = 0;\n            int r = 0;\n\n            if (nums[i] == 0) {\n                for (int j=0; j<i; j++) \n                    l += nums[j];\n                for (int j=i+1; j<N; j++) \n                    r += nums[j];\n                ans += ((l - r) <= 1 && (l - r) >= 0);\n                ans += ((r - l) <= 1  && (r - l) >= 0);\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"make-array-elements-equal-to-zero","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
